attributes.action: Allow the winter fuel allowence to be paid to disabled people with mobility problems and young children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The winter fuel allowance should be paid to all people who are disabled and have mobility problems & to families with disabled young children, It is common sense that if you have mobility problems or young disabled children that like the elderly you will have problems moving around to keep warm, and therefore respectfully petition the goverment to add these vunerable groups to the winter fuel allowance scheme, and if possible before the next winter season.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
